## demo

```{r}
library(quarto.tabset)

df_sample <- data.frame(
  group1 = factor(c(rep("A", 3), rep("B", 3))),
  group2 = rep(c("X", "Y", "Z"), 2),
  var1 = 1:6,
  var2 = 7:12,
  var3 = factor(letters[1:6])
)
```

```{r}
#| results: asis

quarto_tabset(df_sample, c(group1, group2), c(var1, var2, var3))
```
